languages.text: {n}Какофония криков взрывается в вашей голове. Образы заполняют ваш внутренний взор — тела... много тел... тепло чужой крови на ваших руках. Воспоминания первого хозяина машины. Образы гаснут так же внезапно, как появились. Машина ожидает новую команду, затаившись в глубине вашего сознания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хор криков взрывается в вашей голове. Образы заполняют ваш внутренний взор — тела... много тел... тепло чужой крови на ваших руках. Воспоминания первого хозяина машины. Образы гаснут так же внезапно, как появились. Машина ожидает новую команду, затаившись в глубине вашего сознания.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Какофония криков взрывается в вашей голове. Образы заполняют ваш внутренний взор — тела... много тел... тепло чужой крови на ваших руках. Воспоминания первого хозяина машины. Образы гаснут так же внезапно, как появились. Машина ожидает новую команду, затаившись в глубине вашего сознания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your mind explodes in a cacophony of screams. Images are swarming your mind's eye. Bodies... lots of bodies... warm blood on your hands that is not your own. The memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, and is awaiting a new command.{/n}

languages.text: {n}頭の中で、悲鳴の不協和音が炸裂した。脳裏には次々と映像が押し寄せる。死体…大量の死体…自分の手は、自分のものではない温かい血で濡れている…それはこの機械の最初の所有者の記憶だった。その映像は現れたときと同じように、突然消え去った。機械は密かにあなたの意識の奥深くに入り込み、次の命令を待ち構えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}頭の中で、悲鳴の不協和音が炸裂した。脳裏には次々と映像が押し寄せる。死体…大量の死体…自分の手は、自分のものではない温かい血で濡れている…それはこの機械の最初の所有者の記憶だった。その映像は現れたときと同じように、突然消え去った。機械は密かにあなたの意識の奥深くに入り込み、次の命令を待ち構えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Kakophonie von Schreien explodiert in deinem Kopf. Bilder schießen vor deinem geistigen Auge vorbei. Leichen ... viele Leichen ... warmes Blut auf deinen Händen, aber nicht dein eigenes. Das sind die Erinnerungen des ersten Besitzers der Maschine. Die Bilder verschwinden so schnell wieder, wie sie gekommen sind. Die Maschine hat sich tief in dein Unterbewusstsein geschlichen, wo sie auf deinen nächsten Befehl wartet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Kakophonie von Schreien explodiert in deinem Kopf. Bilder schießen vor deinem geistigen Auge vorbei. Leichen ... viele Leichen ... warmes Blut auf deinen Händen, aber nicht dein eigenes. Das sind die Erinnerungen des ersten Besitzers der Maschine. Die Bilder verschwinden so schnell wieder, wie sie gekommen sind. Die Maschine hat sich tief in dein Unterbewusstsein geschlichen, wo sie auf deinen nächsten Befehl wartet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une cacophonie de hurlements retentit dans votre tête et un déluge d'images assaille votre esprit : des cadavres... des cadavres partout... et vos mains couvertes d'un sang chaud qui n'est pas le vôtre. Ce sont les souvenirs du premier propriétaire de la machine. Les images s'effacent aussi soudainement qu'elles sont apparues. La machine s'est glissée au plus profond de votre conscience, où elle attend votre prochain ordre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une cacophonie de hurlements retentit dans votre tête et un déluge d'images assaille votre esprit : des cadavres... des cadavres partout... et vos mains couvertes d'un sang chaud qui n'est pas le vôtre. Ce sont les souvenirs du premier propriétaire de la machine. Les images s'effacent aussi soudainement qu'elles sont apparues. La machine s'est glissée au plus profond de votre conscience, où elle attend votre prochain ordre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una cacofonía de gritos estalla en el interior de tu cabeza. Una serie de imágenes se arremolinan en tu mente: cuerpos... montones de cuerpos... tus manos cubiertas de sangre cálida que no es tuya... los recuerdos del primer usuario de la máquina. Las imágenes cesan tan abruptamente como aparecieron. La máquina se ha infiltrado en lo más profundo de tu consciencia y aguarda allí tu próxima orden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una cacofonía de gritos estalla en el interior de tu cabeza. Una serie de imágenes se arremolinan en tu mente: cuerpos... montones de cuerpos... tus manos cubiertas de sangre cálida que no es tuya... los recuerdos del primer usuario de la máquina. Las imágenes cesan tan abruptamente como aparecieron. La máquina se ha infiltrado en lo más profundo de tu consciencia y aguarda allí tu próxima orden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一阵刺耳的尖叫声仿佛在你的脑海中爆开，无数画面涌入了你的脑海——尸体……很多很多尸体……你的双手沾满了别人的鲜血。这是这台机器第一位主人的记忆。随后，画面猛然消失。这台机器已经再次潜入了你的意识深处，等待着你接下来的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵刺耳的尖叫声仿佛在你的脑海中爆开，无数画面涌入了你的脑海——尸体……很多很多尸体……你的双手沾满了别人的鲜血。这是这台机器第一位主人的记忆。随后，画面猛然消失。这台机器已经再次潜入了你的意识深处，等待着你接下来的命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafanın içinde bir çığlık kakofonisi patlak veriyor. Zihninde bir dizi görüntü canlanıyor. Sayısız ceset... Ellerinde sana ait olmayan kanın sıcaklığını hissediyorsun. Bunlar, makinenin ilk sahibinin anıları. Görüntüler, göründükleri gibi aniden kayboluyor. Bilincinin derinliklerine sinsice sızan makine, sıradaki emrini bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cacophony of screams explodes inside your head. Images swarm in your mind's eye — bodies... lots of bodies... your hands covered in warm blood that is not your own — the memories of the machine's first owner. The images flicker out as suddenly as they appeared. The machine has sneaked its way deep inside your consciousness, where it awaits your next command.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kafanın içinde bir çığlık kakofonisi patlak veriyor. Zihninde bir dizi görüntü canlanıyor. Sayısız ceset... Ellerinde sana ait olmayan kanın sıcaklığını hissediyorsun. Bunlar, makinenin ilk sahibinin anıları. Görüntüler, göründükleri gibi aniden kayboluyor. Makine, bilincinin derinliklerine sinsice sızmış vaziyette, sıradaki emrini bekliyor.{/n}
